body.name: INNERSY Womens Underwear Cotton Hipster Panties Regular & Plus Size 6-Pack
features: Fabric type Body: 95% cotton, 5% spandex. Crotch: 100% cotton

Comfy Daily Underwear: Hip measurement in inches. X-Small:34-35.5; Small:36-37.5; Medium:38-39.5; Large:40-41.5; X-Large:42-43.5; XX-Large:44-45.5. Noted:This underwear is just regular underwear for daily use, pls search INNERSY period panties for period need
No Show Underwear: Thin flat and stretchy elastic waistband at the top offer a smooth appearance for no show purpose. Serve well for tight/skinny jeans and dresses/skirts
Hipster Panties: The waistband hits right at the waistline, about 2 or 3 inches below belly buttons(please see model pictures for more reference). Serve well for low rise jeans/pants/dresses
Vibrant and Basic Colors: Black, white, red, grey, green, navy and many more light bright colors match needs of clothes for spring, summer, fall and winter occasions
Wash Care: Machine wash warm; Only non-chlorine bleach when needed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seriously HAPPY 😊 with my first ever online underwear purchase!
reviews.reviewText: So I decided to post pictures with this review of everything that I would have liked to know before purchasing these underwear. I had never before bought underwear online and it took about 2 days of going back and forth reading reviews and still not being sure of the exact size because supposedly there is no set standard? I wear a size 16 in woman’s jeans and sometimes an 18 if they run super small but most sized 18 pants are way too big. So it’s odd. I ordered a size XXL in these because I really just didn’t know and they seemed gigantic when I pulled them out of the package but then I sent them through the wash with my other laundry nothing special then threw them in the dryer hot like always and they came out looking much more my size not like a flag or a sail for a ⛵️ boat. I felt so much better! I put them on and they fit great not too big at all and not too tight, I feel like as I’ve gotten older after my 30’s I was trying to fit in way too small a size of underwear that used to fit. I’ve recently gotten into these hipster underwear because they stay in place and aren’t granny like at all. I don’t do briefs because it’s too much fabric for my taste. And department stores are really expensive 3 for 30$ seriously 😳 that’s no deal and searching through clearance on my knees hurts after 5 min I’m literally sitting on the floor with my not so cheap designer bag flung next to me looking probably like a crazy 😜 woman. So yes I made it through my first online order for underwear and couldn’t be happier. The quality seems really good and I hope you can see the stitch work in my pictures. I don’t wear pads but I’m sure they will stick in the crotch part just fine, I added pics of the crotch as well and it’s grey in all of them that I got in this pack. No issues no strings hanging after the wash and I doubt it will ever happen anytime soon. The cotton material is pretty soft, I’ve had softer but once again those were one pair I randomly did find once in a clearance bin at a department store, I can’t help it I always look, the waist band is covered nicely and the leg holes are as well(see pics)! The striped ones and solids are nice bright colors too, I like that and they match up at the seams. I always look at seams to see if they match. These do, funny because my Dad taught me how to spot that when I was way younger and how if they don’t match it’s cheap junk, no matter what you are buying. They did a pretty good job on the seams so I am satisfied there too. So my first online underwear purchase was a complete 💯 success I should also add just buy them, I know you will still read a ton more reviews I did. But the price is on point and Prime delivery 🚚 came within 24 hours for me, got to 💙 Prime! Oh and package was nice and professional( see pic)! Definitely give these a go and if not try and try again, but I’m super picky and hard to please, 5 ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ All the way!!! I really hope that I helped someone out there with this review, seriously that’s why I write these because sharing is important and opinions matter! Definitely 💯SATISFIED 💯!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than Many Popular Name Brands
reviews.reviewText: These fit great, are comfortable, look good (not going for the sexy look but practical), are well made, and wash/dry well (no shrinking or fading). They are not thin, they're opaque, and the colors are solid and attractive. These are easily way better than the Reebok ones I bought a while ago which started to fall apart quickly. The price is great too. I will probably buy more in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most comfortable ever! Forget brand names
reviews.reviewText: They have become my everyday for every occasion undies. Soooooo comfortable! They are super soft, mostly cotton -- which is important to me -- and are full coverage so they stay in place. You forget you have them on! No shrinking, fading, or color transfer. They are not tight, so you don't get belly or side bulges, yet don't ride up.Great fit, perfect everyday undies! BTW, bought a pack for mom and after trying them, she threw all others away. Now she's replacing them all. : )

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable white undies with brushed cotton, great fit
reviews.reviewText: When five years pass after your last underwear purchase, it can be difficult to find the same undergarments as manufacturers are always changing styling, sizing or materials. I was looking for FOTL Breathable Cotton Mesh in hip huggers that came out in 2017, but they are no longer made. I decided on these as they looked similar and I wanted all white, no mixed colors. I almost went with Jockey, but they are priced more, so I decided to try the Innersy brand. Please read the sizing information for these, at the end is a P.S. about them being a snug fit. I measured my hips, 36 1/2" and first chose size Small, but after reading about the snug fit and that I normally don't wear size small in most things, like blouses, so I decided to go with the size Medium.Overall I am very happy with them!The package of six arrived quickly, the package being a plastic slider bag. I measured one pair prior to laundering them: Flat rough measurements across top 13 1/2", from top to bottom 9 1/2", leg opening 7 1/2". I then laundered them with similar white items, dried them on low and measured them. They reduced a fraction over 1/4" in all measurements.These are made in China, and I normally avoid Chinese manufactured clothing as they don't last long. That's why I gave these four stars as I've only had them for a week. The material is a soft brushed cotton that isn't real thin like some cottons today where you can easily see through them. It's easy to tell if you have them right side out as the liner is a light gray cotton material. These have the cotton covered elastic waistband and leg bands, which is what I was looking for. When I put them on, they were amazingly comfortable to do so. The look is very nice and are soft to the touch. Good job to this company, and I will be ordering more before any changes are made to these in the future. I hope not.I usually buy Fruit of the Loom in size 6. I used to buy Hanes, but somewhere back in the early to mid 2000's, their overall sizing was reduced, so instead of the size 6 I used to buy, they became too tight and I had to go up to size 7. I said "forget them". These Innersy Women's Underwear Cotton Hipster Panties Regular medium size are like a Hanes size 7 or a FOTL size 6 for my 36 1/2 inch hip.Edited: 2 years later and I still like these. Shrinkage is not bad. Dimensions of size medium are Across top: 13 1/4", across widest point: 14 3/4", Top to Bottom center 9 1/2", side seam length 5", leg opening outside edge 7". When I lay Hanes size 6 cotton bikini on top of these, the Hanes are 1/4" wider. If I lay FOTL cotton bikini across the top, the FOTL are 1/2" wider. The most noticeable difference between these Innersy white cotton underwear vs. Hanes and FOTL is the leg openings are smaller on the Innersy white hipster, not really noticeable for long after you put them on. Also, the Innersy are softer cotton than the other two brands and feel a bit thicker in density, which I like. They are still holding up to many washing and dryings. I'm thinking of getting a size Large next time to see how they fit, as the mediums are every so slightly tight, but not in an uncomfortable way. Currently my hips measure 35".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love these
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical because of the price point, but these are very comfortable underwear. I like the fabric, it is nice and soft. The colors are pretty. The fit is flattering. They are cut to where they look cute, and they don't ride up. They also don't look like old lady underwear. I appreciate that. I liked them so much, I bought a second pack and I don't regret it. I expect them to also last, not fall apart after a couple of washed. As long as they make these, I will buy them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these underwear as I had recently lost weight and needed some new ones. These fit just as described. Very true to size. I am 150 lbs and ordered size Medium! I love how soft these are. I already bought more bundles! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant to buy these but after reading reviews decided to give them a try and I am so glad I did. The fit is perfect and they are so comfortable. They also wash and dry very well.
